greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter (2-adic valuation of sigma(n) & 2-adic valuation of n): a(n) = P(A286357(n), A001511(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function, with a(1) = 0 by an explicit convention.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
program: from sympy import divisor_sigma as D
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
def a(n): return 0 if n==1 else T(a001511(D(n)), a001511(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 14 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 13 2017
